game.name: 永远消失的幻想乡 ～ The Disappearing of Gensokyo
game.categories: 싱글 플레이어, Steam 도전 과제, Steam 트레이딩 카드, 컨트롤러 일부 지원, Steam Cloud, 가족 공유
game.shortDescription: "The Disappearing of Gensokyo" is a Touhou Project doujin game from MyACG Studio, a Chinese doujin game fan circle. We have re-imagined Touhou as an ARPG, creating this "Danmaku-Shooting-ARPG". We hope this game will be a good experience for those who are both new and knowledgeable of Touhou!
game.shortDescriptionEn: "The Disappearing of Gensokyo" is a Touhou Project doujin game from MyACG Studio, a Chinese doujin game fan circle. We have re-imagined Touhou as an ARPG, creating this "Danmaku-Shooting-ARPG". We hope this game will be a good experience for those who are both new and knowledgeable of Touhou!

reviewHighlights.text: 영원소실의 환상향은 이제 공식적으로 한글화가 되었습니다! 감사합니다!! ------- https://drive.google.com/open?id=1yf7NIRc5Oy6e8TTXE0KtWOcVt5mfQUz- 한글패치 미완성판, 12월 이후 검수 및 최종판 완성 예정 7/...
가격도 착하며 생각보다 많이 재밌다, 다만 도전과제 영어도 좀... 팁 - 코가사, 히지리깡패임, 미만 잡. 여기서도 앨리스는 쓰레기냐 ! !
